description: Mainstreaming Coastal and Marine Biodiversity Conservation into  Production Sectors in the East Godavari River Estuarine Ecosystem, Andhra Pradesh

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Mainstream biodiversity (BD) conservation into the production sectors of East Godavari River Estuarine Ecosystem (EGREE) through: Cross-sectoral planning in the EGREE, enhanced capacity of sector institutions for implementing BD-friendly sector plans, and improved community livelihoods and sustainable natural resource use.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Biodiversity Conservation

title: Mainstreaming Coastal & Marine Biodiversity Conservation
